trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Morrison
There were no other sightings in Morrison on or around November 6th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy Friend and I were in my backyard on Saturday November 6th 2010 at approximately 5:15 PM when I looked up and saw two oddly shaped objects in the sky about 600 - 700 feet above my house.At first I thought they were balloons, or kites, but they were not. My friend and I were baffled because there was a moment when they seemed to hover for a few seconds, then started to to move slowly from northeast to southwest at about approximately 40 mph. The breeze at the time was going from west to east so we knew they were NOT balloons. I ran as fast as I could inside to get my camera, and snapped 4 shots of them. The objects were black in color and had a semi-round appearance, until they would tilt sideways and were flat like a pancake. They continued southwest for approximately 10 miles, or until we could no longer see them. All the while they were tilting, or rotating.
Summary: Standing with friend in backyard 2 UFO's flew over us. Ran inside and snapped 4 photos.
